item.title: Principles of Microeconomics learning panel
item.description:
This platform supports the teaching of microeconomics.

It allows the user to interact configuring scenarios of economic policies and check the results.

item.title: Macroeconomics learning panel
item.description:
This platform supports the teaching of macroeconomics.

It facilitates the access to updated macroeconomic indicators.

It allows the user to interact configuring scenarios of economic policies and check the results according to different macroeconomic models.

The platform has been developed with the colaboration of Juan Luis Eugenio Martí.

item.title: Multimodal cartography of transport infrastructures in the Canary Islands
item.description:
It carries out a cartography of the existing road and port infrastructures in the Canary Islands.

The project was funded by Gobierno de Canarias.

This project was realized with Francisco Javier Campos Méndez and Carmen García Galindo.
